attributes.action: Make it illegal to leave homless couples in a hostal for over a year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My wife and i have been left in a hostal with no contact with the homelessness othority and they stated that they have to process new cases and leave us there, we have a growing daughter and she is growing fast she will be 5 months on saturday and she will be crawling soon on the disgusting floors of the hostal unit

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/housingnohostels/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
